name: NetroStar
tag_list: web-design, www, internet, ecommerce, design, website, websites, solution, e-commerce
overview:
Netrostar Inc is an international team of professionals: software engineers, web developers, graphic designers and SEO specialists. With over 8 years of deep industry expertise the company has become an established expert in the area of Web Design, Custom Software Development, E-commerce and Internet Marketing.

Netrostar helped over 100 corporations to gain a competitive edge so far. The company serves virtually every industry and has clients on all continents (in 40 countries worldwide).

Netrostar mission is to become longterm, trusted partners for all their clients that understand their business strategic objectives and drive their growth.

Netrostar offer their clients:

  • Expert project management
  • Fast and friendly communication
  • Professionalism and flexibility
  • Comprehensive specifications and documentation for all projects
  • Latest technologies and technical expertise
  • Unique design
  • Extensive testing by their Quality Assurance Laboratory
  • Responsive customer support service
  • Reasonable cost
  • End Product that is a user-friendly, functional, reliable, long-term viable solution, 100% answering your business needs, delivered on time and within budget ï‚§ Outstanding service record

Netrostar delivers value-added web design services and software products that respond to specific business requirements for superior quality, maximum utility, and cost-effectiveness.
